name: Xena Warrior Princess
description:
Xena Warrior Princess

is an action-adventure mini-game created by nrgcore.com for the Game Jolt Together Jam inspired from the classic Television Series "Xena: Warrior Princess".

NRGeditor - Realtime Application Development Environment

The game was created from scratch in 2 weeks by one programmer and one artist using NRG as a development platform. This half square km forest level was only made possible in such a short amount of time by taking full advantage of the rapid realtime application development environment provided by the NRG ecosystem.Click Here to download the FULL project (source code and assets)

It is a single-player game, which features a third-person, over-the-shoulder free camera view. The player controls the character Xena in a combination of slash and chakram slicing combat, and puzzle game elements to achieve goals and complete the story.

Throughout the game, Xena's main weapon is a sword and a chakram which can be thrown and summoned back to her hand to hit enemies and certain puzzle switches to unlock upcoming challenge. Different colors of orbs can be found in chests or collected through fighting enemies to increase random amount of health and unlock her maximum power.
